Online gradient descent

Like (offline) gradient descent but instead of ff, we use fif_i, i∈1,…,Ti \in 1,…,T

𝐱*=argmin𝐱fi(𝐱)\mathbf{x}^* = \arg \min_{\mathbf{x}} f_i(\mathbf{x}) (the offline optimum)

Assume:

  • f1,.,,fTf_1,.,,f_T are all convex
  • Each is G-Lipschitz: for all 𝐱\mathbf{x}, ii, ||∇fi(𝐱)||2≤G||\nabla f_i(\mathbf{x})||_2 \leq G
  • starting radius: ||𝐱*−𝐱(1)||2≤R||\mathbf{x}^{*}-\mathbf{x}^{(1)}||_2 \leq R

Online Gradient descent:

  • Choose 𝐱(1)\mathbf{x}^{(1)} and η=RGT\eta = \frac{R}{G \sqrt{T}}.
  • For i=0,…,Ti=0,…,T:
    • Play 𝐱(i)\mathbf{x}^{(i)}
    • Observe fif_i and incur cost fi(𝐱(i))f_i(\mathbf{x}^{(i)})
    • 𝐱(i+1)=𝐱(i)−η∇fi(𝐱(i))\mathbf{x}^{(i+1)}=\mathbf{x}^{(i)}-\eta \nabla f_i(\mathbf{x}^{(i)})
